library.topic: Simple home skincare routine for beginners
library.title: Home Skincare Routine Library
library.description: A practical library of items for a beginner friendly skincare routine at home.
library.notes: Keep it gentle and beginner friendly. Avoid medical claims.

blueprints.title: 10-Min Skincare Starter
blueprints.description: A simple AM and PM routine that fits a busy schedule.
blueprints.notes: Prefer fragrance-free options. Keep steps short and safe.
